LenovoRemoteControlService.description: The Event Service resource contains properties for managing event subcriptions and generates the events sent to subscribers.  The resource has links to the actual collection of subscriptions (called Event Destinations).
LenovoRemoteControlService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an event service for a Redfish implementation.

title: #LenovoRemoteControlService.LenovoRemoteControlService
